mapper.insert: insert into PARKING (owner, carType, carNumber, fileName, parkingSpot, regdate) values (#{owner}, #{carType}, #{carNumber}, #{fileName}, #{parkingSpot}, #{regDate})
mapper.update: update PARKING set owner=#{owner}, carType=#{carType}, carNumber=#{carNumber}, fileName=#{fileName}, outDate=#{outDate}, parkingSpot=#{parkingSpot} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from PARKING order by seq desc
